backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report describing new animation effects and trigger logic with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing high‑level summaries of various frontend components and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining color variables and dark mode values for layout and components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the ValentinePage component as the main app.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHeartsOv: Displays multiple animated floating heart emojis across the screen.
frontend/src/components/PersonalMomentEf: Trigger‑activated overlay generating sparkles and heart burst animations for 3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/PhotoGallery.tsx: Three‑tile photo gallery showing two images and a placeholder for a third.
frontend/src/components/ValentinePage.ts: Main Valentine experience with music, sections, gallery, proposal buttons, and triggers for special effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and authentication flow.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles with romantic theme, gallery rules, floating hearts, and personal moment animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, container queries, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, current version, and a list of implemented features for the ICP app.
